title: Saturday's NBA TV tripleheader full of star power
description: NBA TV’s Saturday tripleheader boasts two Western Conference duels featuring four former Kia NBA MVPs.

title: NBA players born on Nov. 3
description: With over 5,000 players in NBA history, at least one player was born on every day of the calendar year.

title: Starting 5, Oct. 26: AD sparks Lakers' rally
description: No rim is safe when the Greek Freak gets going.

title: 5 takeaways: Down 22, Davis rallies Lakers
description: The Lakers look like AD's team, JJ Redick appears ready for the job and the Suns' defense remains a work in progress.

title: 5 things to know: Rockets-Spurs (8:30 ET, League Pass)
description: Victor Wembanyama and the San Antonio Spurs take on Alperen Sengun's Rockets in an all-Texas matchup.

title: 5 takeaways: Towns delivers in MSG opener
description: Karl-Anthony Towns shines under the MSG spotlight, Tyrese Haliburton sputters and the Knicks roll in their home opener.

title: Hornets' Miller (glute) out at least a week
description: Miller, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2023 NBA Draft, is expected to miss at least 3 games.

title: Ingram, Williamson ready to step up
description: There are reasons to believe the Pelicans can stay afloat while Murray is injured, starting with Brandon Ingram and Zion Williamson.

title: Early season waiver wire adds
description: RotoWire targets the best waiver wire additions early in the 2024-25 NBA season.

title: 5 things to know: Grizz-Rockets (8 ET, League Pass)
description: Houston looks to rebound from its season opening loss against a well-balanced Memphis squad.

title: Kia MVP Ladder: 15 names to eye in '24-25
description: Fresh faces are looking to raise their profile as defending Kia MVP Nikola Jokić eyes his 4th career trophy.

title: NBA alters Warriors-Blazers score after finding error
description: Golden State was not credited for a made free throw in the third quarter of its now 140-104 win vs. Portland.
